title: Michelle Obama
description: Former First Lady Michelle Obama has dedicated her life and her career to bringing people together and helping them succeed. Michelle Obama provides students with a detailed look at the life and characteristics of this influential and inspirational woman. The book can also be used to teach students how to identify elements of a biography as well as identify and use proper nouns.
meta: advise, descended, determined, diverse, encouraged, first lady, law, politics, volunteer
Elements of a Biography : Determine elements of a biography
Proper Nouns : Recognize and use proper nouns as names of people
Time and Order Words : Identify and use time and order words

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
